backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user binders, photocards, themes, authorization, and subscription status with CRUD utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light and dark modes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, screen routing, and accent color initialization.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderFra: Visual frame component rendering a binder-style page with textures and theming support.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderRin: Static overlay component showing binder rings graphic on the page.
frontend/src/components/binder/PageSwipe: Wrapper adding swipe gesture handling and page‑flip animations for paginated views.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccentCol: UI dropdown for choosing accent colors using a predefined palette and the accent‑color hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper with header, footer, user display, accent selector, and logout handling.
frontend/src/config/subscription.ts: Reads and validates the Shopify upgrade URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPanel.ts: Login screen using Internet Identity with accent initialization and sign‑in UI.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal for initial profile setup that saves a user’s display name.
frontend/src/features/binders/theme.ts: Provides a default binder theme configuration object.
frontend/src/features/cards/editedImageC: LocalStorage helpers for saving, retrieving, and clearing edited card images.
frontend/src/features/cards/imageValidat: Validates image uploads by checking type and enforcing a 10MB size limit.
frontend/src/features/editor/stickerTray: Defines sticker metadata and loads sticker images from a sprite sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccentColor.ts: Manages user‑selected accent color and applies CSS custom property overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinderPagination.t: Provides pagination state and helpers for photocard arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, subscription status, binders, and photocards through an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeGesture.ts: Implements swipe detection logic for touch and mouse events, exposing handler callbacks for left and right swipes.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and extensive theme variables for light and dark modes, including custom scrapbook and binder color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/AddCardScreen.tsx: UI for uploading and validating a photocard, handling file preview, progress, and submission via useAddPhotocard.
frontend/src/screens/BinderLibraryScreen: Displays the user's binder list with subscription-based limits and supports creating and deleting binders.
frontend/src/screens/BinderSettingsScree: Provides a UI to customize a binder’s theme and saves changes through useUpdateBinderTheme.
frontend/src/screens/BinderViewScreen.ts: Displays a binder’s cards with pagination and supports drag‑and‑drop reordering, updating backend order and handling navigation actions.
frontend/src/screens/EditCardScreen.tsx: Provides a canvas-based card editor allowing sticker placement, manipulation, and saving edited images.
Normalizes backend errors into user‑friendly messages, with special handling for binder limit errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Contains metadata, features, and pending requests related to subscription handling and Shopify integration.
